favourite.article: All my troublesome emotions dig away! Lord Jesus we just want Your life to flow!

Hallelujah! Oh how sweet it is to release the divine life! Oh how sweet it is to let go of all bitterness and have the Lord dig away dig away the hindrances in our hearts, that life may flow! Life can flow, praise the Lord, life can flow!
Hmm, an awesome Hymn, really soul lifting, condemnation in my heart dig away!

I enjoyed in the Winter Training on message 10. Abraham dug wells in Beer-Sheba and later redeemed them with seven ewe lambs. This is Elim, where it's flourishing with 12 springs and 70 palm trees. But over time, it got covered up with dirt and other things. Isaac didn't have to dig new wells, but just open them up through digging. This is like our heart. There is a well in our spirit flowing with water and it's covenanted by The Lord. But we need to dig away the dirt that accumulated that the water can flow again!

When we finally become numb to our self, His life can flow!
He is shepherding us until we love Him more than we love ourselves!
I can sing this song with conviction--Lord, let it be done in me! Dig away!
